summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GameShop Nepal e-commerce application. Backend APIs working at 97.1% success rate, frontend UI fully functional with admin panel and product ordering system.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Create Payment Method returns 520 Internal Server Error due to MongoDB ObjectId serialization error
flaky_endpoints.impact: Admin cannot create payment methods through UI

passed_tests: Homepage loads with Trustpilot reviews and customer reviews marquee
Navigation links work (Home, About, Blog, Terms)
Admin dashboard shows stats cards for categories, products, reviews, social links
All admin management pages accessible (Categories, Products, Reviews, FAQs, Pages, Social Links, Notification Bar, Blog)
Product page displays correctly with variations and pricing
Order dialog opens and form validation works
Backend APIs: Categories CRUD, Products CRUD, Reviews CRUD, FAQs CRUD, Social Links CRUD, Pages API, Notification Bar, Blog Posts
Seed data endpoint creates reviews, social links, and FAQs successfully
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix MongoDB ObjectId serialization error in payment methods endpoint (line 696-698 in server.py). The error occurs when trying to return payment method data containing ObjectId fields that are not JSON serializable.
success_percentage: Backend: 97.1% (34/35 API calls successful), Frontend: 100% (all UI components and flows working)
